title: Item sets in new client?
body: Did they just say they added it and then not add it? I can't find it anywhere

replies.body:
Item sets are now live! ^_^

You should see it under your collection page, and here's a handy image if you can't seem to find it still!

https://i.gyazo.com/c67c17259aa4f159b1a3e4c5032cdc65.png
does anyone know how to use it? I go to create and nothing happens
Works fine for me, what's it doing wrong?
They said they are working on it.
Patchnotes say its in. NOW it shows up, wasn't when I posted
